changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE USER_ACTION ( ID BIGSERIAL NOT NULL, ACTION_TYPE VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, REQUEST_BODY VARCHAR(4000) NOT NULL, SUCCESS BOOL DEFAULT FALSE, ERROR_CODE VARCHAR(255), IS_ROLLED_BACK BOOL DEFAULT FALSE, REQUEST_ID VARCHAR(255), CREATED_AT TIMESTAMP(6) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT USER_ACTION_PKEY PRIMARY KEY (ID) );
